text:
BREAKING NEWS: @GovKemp will sign executive order today to close K-12 public schools for the rest of the year, says online learning will continue, due to coronavirus pandemic. 

WATCH LIVE NOW on Channel 2: https://t.co/U7SlSL4iQo https://t.co/gJoTtsP7m7

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

entity.name: Education
entity.description: Education through the lens of those passionate about resources and news. This topic excludes Education policy and reform.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
